title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 267 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
January 9, 2018
On Monday, January 8, 2018, the President signed into law:H.R. 267, the “Martin Luther King, Jr. National Historical Park Act,” which redesignates the Martin Luther King, Junior, National Historic Site in the State of Georgia as the Martin Luther King, Jr. National Historical Park.
